contents:
admin:
    favicon_entry: 'images/favicon.png'
    favicon_type: 'image/png'
    storage:
        # The storage driver to use. It can be none, filesystem or dsn
        driver: 'none'
        public_path: /public/storage
        public_url: /storage
        private_path: /assets/storage
        # Json string with storage metadata needed to log in to the dsn storage
        storage_metadata: ''
        # The default allowed image mime_types
        image_mime_types: ['image/jpeg', 'image/jpg', 'image/png', 'image/gif', 'image/svg+xml']
        # The default allowed file mime_types
        file_mime_types: ['application/pdf', 'application/vnd.ms-excel', 'application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet', 'application/msword', 'application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document', 'plain/text']
        menu_entries:
            # Adds a menu entry to administer all images uploaded
            show_images: false
            # Adds a menu entry to administer all image galleries
            show_galleries: false
            # Adds a menu entry to administer all files
            show_files: false

stof_doctrine_extensions:
    default_locale: en_US
    orm:
        default:
            sluggable: true

add-lines.content:
###> TwoForWeb/AdminBundle ###
# Change this in your .env.local to provide an obfuscated url to the admin panel
SC_ADMIN_ROUTE_PREFIX=abcd
SCHEME=https
###< TwoForWeb/AdminBundle ###

app_user_provider:
            entity:
                class: TwoForWeb\AdminBundle\Entity\AdminUser
                property: email

# Consider replacing the main firewall with this one.
        admin:
            lazy: true
            provider: app_user_provider
            remember_me:
                secret: '%kernel.secret%'
                lifetime: 604800
                path: /
            logout:
                path: /logout
                target: /

            form_login:
                login_path: sc_admin_login
                check_path: sc_admin_login
                default_target_path: sc_admin_main
                enable_csrf: true
